Title: Series: Prints in Imitation of Drawings
Description: Landscape with the Rest on the Flight into Egypt; in foreground at left Mary with the Christ child sitting on her lap, an angel and Joseph, a donkey grazing nearby, sheep and goats on bank of river at centre, and figure on bridge and classical portico at right; later state. 1734 Etching with woodcut from two blocks in grey
Curator's comments: For other impressions, see 1977,U.436, 1936,1116.2126.50 and 2006,U.1104. For early state without woodblock, see 1977,U.435. For the original drawing in reverse, see 1957,1214.160. For the series, see comment in 1936,1116.2126.1.
Bibliographic references: Hake 1922 / Pond & Knapton's Imitations of Drawing (18)
Liber Veritatis 1978 / Claude Lorrain: Liber Veritatis (154) (after)
Acquisition notes: There was no registration number on this object, hence the new U number was given when catalogued.
